title: Transformer Models for Natural Language Processing
abstract: This paper introduces transformer architectures and their applications in NLP tasks.

title: A Survey on BERT Fine-Tuning
abstract: This survey covers various approaches to fine-tuning BERT models on downstream tasks.

title: Semantic Search with Sentence Transformers
abstract: We demonstrate how sentence transformers can be used for semantic search in academic corpora.

title: Citation Bias in Academic Search Engines
abstract: This paper analyzes citation bias and proposes methods to reduce its effect in search rankings.

title: Improving Academic Search with Cross-Encoders
abstract: Cross-encoders improve search ranking quality by re-ranking candidate documents with BERT.
